channel.title: Week 5 on Fernando's Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Week 5 on Fernando's Hub

item.title: Hands-On: Deepen Your Learning Journey with GenAI
item.description: Learn how to use GenAI as a conversational partner for learning and discovery, refining answers for deeper understanding.

item.title: Common GenAI Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
item.description: Explore common mistakes users make with GenAI, and get tips to overcome these obstacles and make AI a helpful companion.
